name: S_3_3_2_Manage_End_of_Life_Documents_and_Other_Advance_Directives
title: S.3.3.2 Manage End-of-Life Documents and Other Advance Directives (Function)
description: Manage documents that provide direction for end-of-life care and manage other types of Advance Directives.
purpose: The PHR Account Holder may want to capture and maintain documents that pertain to end-of-life care and to capture and maintain other types of Advance Directives. End-of-life documents include but are not limited to: Advance Directive for Healthcare; Power of Attorney for Healthcare and Physician Order for Life Sustaining Treatment. The system should allow for multiple occurrences of a document and the ability to archive documents. The documents maintained will depend on the jurisdictional law. The documents may or may not reside in the PHR-S. The document may be scanned images, structured documents or simply a notation on the location of the original (hardcopy or original).

statement.label: S.3.3.2#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to capture documents related to end-of-life care and other types of Advance Directives.

statement.label: S.3.3.2#02
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD provide the ability to render a list of end-of life documents sorted by one or more defined data elements.

statement.label: S.3.3.2#03
statement.requirement: The system MAY provide the ability to tag a document as Active or Non-Active by category of document.

statement.label: S.3.3.2#04
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD maintain the end-of-life document and/or a note that specifies that document's location.
